title: Mascot Apps Contest 2015 Face
summary: Watch faces app of cute mascot character that of JP company, service, and group.
description: This is watch faces app of cute mascot character that of Japanese company, service, and group.You can change the character's image, faces, hands, and background.Implemented characters are- Kurei Kei (Pronama-chan)- Tohoku Zunko- Tohoku Itaka- Tohoku Kiritan- Query Lovecraft (Query-chan)- Kohaku Ootori (Unity-chan)- Akamoku Gibasa (Gibasa-chan)- Kyomachi Seika- Tamane-Chan- Jyosyu-Sanada Nobuyuki Komatuhime Project- Nagomi-Chan- Matsumoto Izumi- Tochinogi Ichigo- Makisen-Y≈çkai Maki- Kimiwata project- Hacka Doll(Hacka Doll #1, #2, and #3)- Tsurumi YukaLanguage is selected English or Japanese automatically.This app is applying to Mascot character apps contest 2015.
descriptionHTML:
This is watch faces app of cute mascot character that of Japanese company, service, and group.
You can change the character's image, faces, hands, and background.

Implemented characters are
- Kurei Kei (Pronama-chan)
- Tohoku Zunko
- Tohoku Itaka
- Tohoku Kiritan
- Query Lovecraft (Query-chan)
- Kohaku Ootori (Unity-chan)
- Akamoku Gibasa (Gibasa-chan)
- Kyomachi Seika
- Tamane-Chan
- Jyosyu-Sanada Nobuyuki Komatuhime Project
- Nagomi-Chan
- Matsumoto Izumi
- Tochinogi Ichigo
- Makisen-Yōkai Maki
- Kimiwata project
- Hacka Doll(Hacka Doll #1, #2, and #3)
- Tsurumi Yuka

Language is selected English or Japanese automatically.

This app is applying to Mascot character apps contest 2015.
comments: Fake app? Cant find it anywhere on my phone. Useless
recentChanges: Add character "Kimiwata project", "Matsumoto Izumi", "Makisen-yokai Maki", "Tochinogi Ichigo".
Fix problem that part of images are extend outside.
